mapper.select: select * from v_userrole t1 where userroleid=#{id}
select * from v_userrole t1 where userroleid=#{id}
select * from v_userrole t1 where userroleid=#{id}
select * from v_userrole t1 where userroleid=#{id}
select * from v_userrole t1 where userroleid=#{id}
select * from v_userrole t1 where userroleid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.MEMO, t1.MENUMODE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERROLEID, t1.USERROLENAME, t1.USERROLETYPE FROM T_SRFUSERROLE t1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ISSYSTEM`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`MENUMODE`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`USERDATA`, t1.`USERDATA2`, t1.`USERROLEID`, t1.`USERROLENAME`, t1.`USERROLETYPE` FROM `T_SRFUSERROLE` t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.MEMO, t1.MENUMODE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERROLEID, t1.USERROLENAME, t1.USERROLETYPE FROM T_SRFUSERROLE t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ISSYSTEM AS ISSYSTEM, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.MENUMODE AS MENUMODE, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA AS USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2 AS USERDATA2, t1.USERROLEID AS USERROLEID, t1.USERROLENAME AS USERROLENAME, t1.USERROLETYPE AS USERROLETYPE FROM T_SRFUSERROLE t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ISSYSTEM AS ISSYSTEM, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.MENUMODE AS MENUMODE, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA AS USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2 AS USERDATA2, t1.USERROLEID AS USERROLEID, t1.USERROLENAME AS USERROLENAME, t1.USERROLETYPE AS USERROLETYPE FROM T_SRFUSERROLE t1

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[ISSYSTEM], t1.[MEMO], t1.[MENUMODE], t1.[RESERVER], t1.[RESERVER2], t1.[RESERVER3], t1.[RESERVER4], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[USERDATA], t1.[USERDATA2], t1.[USERROLEID], t1.[USERROLENAME], t1.[USERROLETYPE] FROM [T_SRFUSERROLE] t1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ISSYSTEM`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`MENUMODE`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`USERDATA`, t1.`USERDATA2`, t1.`USERROLEID`, t1.`USERROLENAME`, t1.`USERROLETYPE` FROM `T_SRFUSERROLE` t1 WHERE ( ( 'ibzadmin' = (select t.loginaccountname from t_srfloginaccount t where t.loginaccountid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')}) OR ( t1.`USERDATA` = '20' AND exists(select 1 from t_srfuserroledetail t2 where t2.userroleid = 'BF5D496B-8B7A-4C64-AA5B-82A6D8C18DF2' and t2.userobjectid =#{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')}) ) OR ( t1.`USERDATA` IS NOT NULL AND exists(select 1 from t_srfuserroledetail t2 where t2.userroleid = '32A40E9C-9BC9-41AD-ACDD-DCE44CB4B16C' and t2.userobjectid =#{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')}) ) ) )

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.MEMO, t1.MENUMODE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERROLEID, t1.USERROLENAME, t1.USERROLETYPE FROM T_SRFUSERROLE t1 WHERE ( ( 'ibzadmin' = (select t.loginaccountname from t_srfloginaccount t where t.loginaccountid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')}) OR ( t1.USERDATA = '20' AND exists(select 1 from t_srfuserroledetail t2 where t2.userroleid = 'BF5D496B-8B7A-4C64-AA5B-82A6D8C18DF2' and t2.userobjectid =#{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')}) ) OR ( t1.USERDATA IS NOT NULL AND exists(select 1 from t_srfuserroledetail t2 where t2.userroleid = '32A40E9C-9BC9-41AD-ACDD-DCE44CB4B16C' and t2.userobjectid =#{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')}) ) ) )
